snippet: The officer had approached the student, who was leaving a library, with his gun drawn and briefly detained him after reports of an intruder.
abstract: Internal investigation conducted by Yale University clears unnamed officer of wrongdoing for incident in which he drew his gun, detained a student and ordered him to the ground; school nonetheless recognizes that episode was painful one for student, Tahj Blow, son of New York Times columnist Charles M Blow.
lead_paragraph: The officer had approached the student, who was leaving a library, with his gun drawn and briefly detained him after reports of an intruder.

headline.main: Yale Report Clears Police Officer in Encounter With Student
headline.print_headline: Yale Police Officer Cleared in Encounter
